Docs.summary: Describes the properties of a route.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the package name of the app using the route.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the connection state of the route.
Docs.value: The connection state of this route: #CONNECTION_STATE_DISCONNECTED, #CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTING, or #CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTED.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MediaRoute2InfoConnectionState enum directly instead of this field.", true)]

Docs.summary: A connection state indicating the route is connected.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MediaRoute2InfoConnectionState enum directly instead of this field.", true)]

Docs.summary: A connection state indicating the route is in the process of connecting and is not yet ready for use.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MediaRoute2InfoConnectionState enum directly instead of this field.", true)]

Docs.summary: The default connection state indicating the route is disconnected.
